snippet.title: Songs of Glimmerwick Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Songs of Glimmerwick is a story-driven witch academy RPG where magic is cast through music. "...casting a spell is as easy as playing a song. Attend classes, grow the university garden, make friends, and explore the island’s many oddities and mysteries" https://store.steampowered.com/app/1706510/Songs_of_Glimmerwick/ #gaming #indiegames #cozygames
